code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{useWeb3React}from'@web3-react/core';import{networkConnector}from'../connectors/networkconnector';import useEagerConnect from'../hooks/useEagerConnect';import useInactiveListener from'../hooks/useInactiveListener';function Web3ConnectionProvider(_ref){let{children}=_ref;const context=useWeb3React();const{activate,active}=context;const triedEager=useEagerConnect();useEffect(()=>{if(triedEager&&!active){activate(networkConnector);}},[triedEager,active,activate]);useInactiveListener(!triedEager);return children;}export default Web3ConnectionProvider;
